resources.string: This app needs access to your audio files to play music. Without this permission, you won\'t be able to browse or play any songs from your device.
Audio file access has been denied. The app cannot function without this permission.
This app needs access to your video files to play videos. Without this permission, you won\'t be able to browse or play any videos from your device.
Video file access has been denied. The app cannot function without this permission.
This app needs permission to modify, rename, or delete files. Without this permission, you won\'t be able to organize your media files.
Storage modification access has been denied.
This app needs permission to send you notifications to keep you updated. Without this permission, you won\'t receive important updates.
Please enable it manually in Settings:
